abstract: Bank of America‘s chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, said Wednesday that Merrill Lynch and Countrywide Financial had been “stars” so far this year, despite criticism from analysts over those recent acquisitions.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America‘s chief executive, Kenneth D. Lewis, said Wednesday that Merrill Lynch and Countrywide Financial had been “stars” so far this year, despite criticism from analysts over those recent acquisitions.

headline.main: Lewis Says Merrill and Countrywide Are ‘Stars’
